item.title: Automated Advent of Code repo badges
item.description: Advent of Code The Advent of Code is an annual Advent calendar of short language-agnostic programming puzzles. This year I have been using the Advent of Code to test my knowledge of programming principles, work on algorithmic efficiency, and practice working in new (to me) languages like Julia. Since I am including my work publicly on github, I also thought it would be interesting to try to create an automated repo badge to show off how many stars I have accumulated.

item.title: Hypothetical Outcome Plots
item.description: The Uncertainty of Uncertainty Conveying uncertainty in data visualisations has become a growing topic in data visualisation circles in the past few years. When considering how to visualise data, one must consider who their audience is and how that audience might interpret a visualisation. In the same way writers adopt different styles of writing to convey information to different audiences, dataviz practitioners might choose color, layout, or typography to suit different audiences (e.
